    • Method Detail

      • nearPlane

        public Camera.Builder nearPlane(float nearPlane)
        The closest part of the Camera's view frustum to its eye location. Practically, anything closer to the Camera than its near plane will not be rendered.
        Parameters:
        nearPlane - the perpendicular distance from the Camera's eye to the near plane
        Returns:
        this builder

      • farPlane

        public Camera.Builder farPlane(float farPlane)
        The furthest part of the Camera's viewing volume from its eye location. Practically, anything further from the camera than its far plane will not be rendered.
        Parameters:
        farPlane - the perpendicular distance from the Camera's eye to the far plane
        Returns:
        this builder

      • aspectRatio

        public Camera.Builder aspectRatio(float aspectRatio)
        The ratio of the width of a Camera's viewing volume to the height.
        Parameters:
        aspectRatio - this Camera's aspect ratio
        Returns:
        this builder

      • fov

        public Camera.Builder fov(float fov)
        Short for "Field of View", the angle between the top plane of the Camera's viewing volume and the bottom
        Parameters:
        fov - this Camera's FOV
        Returns:
        this builder

      • eye

        public Camera.Builder eye(org.joml.Vector3f eye)
        The location in space from which the Camera's perspective originates
        Parameters:
        eye - this Camera's eye vector
        Returns:
        this builder

        public Camera.Builder look(org.joml.Vector3f look)

        public Camera.Builder up(org.joml.Vector3f up)

      • build

        public Camera build()
        Returns:
